scenes.action_text: COLOMBIANA Written by Robert Mark Kamen & Luc Besson August 2009 ON A BLACK SCREEN BOGOTA, COLOMBIA 1997 CLOSE ON A PAGE OF A LARA CROFT COMIC BOOK Being copied, with uncanny precision, down to the last detail, by a ten year old hand clutching a pencil. VOICE Cataleya! The page of a notebook turns, revealing neat cursive handwriting, covers the comic.
